actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to allow regulated investment companies capital loss carryovers for a period of 8 years.

summary.text: Allows regulated investment companies capital loss carryovers for a period of eight years (presently, five years is the permitted period). States that this provision shall apply to net capital losses incurred in taxable years ending after January 1, 1970.

titles.title: A bill to allow regulated investment companies capital loss carryovers for a period of 8 years.
